name: BOMBLE!!
description:
BOMBLE is exhilarating action puzzle game
Hit the ball to the enemy!!
It feels good chain of balls

FEATURES:
- Beautiful and elegant game effects
- Puzzle with rich gimmick
- More than 80 stage
- Skin of explosion effect

Rule:
- Tap and hold screen near a ball to gather other balls
- The arrow will be rotating while holding screen
- You can shoot a ball in the direction of the arrow by stopping holding it
- Balls will explode and make enemies disappear by hitting them

Tips:
- Balls be disappeared if they hit black hole
- Balls with same colours will be explode if they hit each other
- Tap near enemies can make them move away

Gimmicks:
- Black Hole
- Warp Hole
- Rotating obstacle
- Floor to accelerate the ball
